oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: ||kabbo's song sung on the occasion of the theft of his tobacco pouch by the dog 'Blom'. It concerns his 'tobacco-hunger'. 1) see The loss of ||kabbo's tobacco bag, which was stolen by a hungry dog, belonging to !gou !nui, named 'Blom', 2) This story is found in Book VIII-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ||kabbo's song on the loss of his tobacco pouch
